body: :x: Don't commit this yet, need a proper sub-directory.  cp -a doesn't work on Mac OS like it does on every other unix :-(
Interesting to keep in history, but now deprecated - closing.
What is the difference for this spike: https://github.com/novoda/Spikes/tree/master/StickyGridHeadersTest ?
Don't forget a readme. We're playing catch up with some of the other spikes I know

@mr-archano what do you :eyes: of this? Then :shipit:
@ouchadam can we merge this and you take the comments as TODO or close the PR for now?
I saw you comment on this but couldn't find it. Is it worth keeping? It's very simple, I'd be happy to delete it.
the wiki link in the readme doesn't work anymore :scream:

screenshots of the options given when you hit the share option from button 1 would have been nice?
MRU is an acronym, is the meaning obvious?

Comments addressed, PR description updated with new screenshots
